name: Chris Buck
detail: Chris Buck was born on February 24, 1958 in Wichita, Kansas, USA as Christopher James Buck. He is known for his work on Frozen (2013), Surf's Up (2007) and Frozen II (2019). He is married to Shelley Rae Hinton. They have three children.

works.name: Frozen Fever / 冰雪奇缘：生日惊喜
